name: GeekHouse
tagline: Exploring the Role of Lawyer as CTO
body:
# "From Bleak House to Geek House: The Lawyer as CTO"

This symposium, on April 4th at Brooklyn Law School, concludes with a [panel discussion on the role of Lawyer as CTO](http://www.brooklaw.edu/newsandevents/events/2014/~/media/88DD1F044EB043C3BDFC29D4302E6152.ashx) .

This html page may be used to support easy display of information related to that panel.  


### For More Information on @LegalScience

We use GitHub Pages because we use GitHub for almost everything and for lot of purposes HTML works fine... and sometimes it is exactly the best way to display.  For more information on @LegalScience research activities, check out [http://LegalScience.TV](http://LegalScience.TV).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
